SlightCSV
Simple and lightweight CSV parser library written in C++.

198  class slightmatrix_error: public exception {};
199 
202  class slightmatrix_parameter_error: public slightmatrix_error {
203  const char* what() const throw() {
204  return "Invalid parameter.";
205  }
206  };
207 
210  class slightmatrix_column_error: public slightmatrix_error {
211  const char* what() const throw() {
212  return "Invalid column count or index.";
213  }
214  };
215 
218  class slightmatrix_row_error: public slightmatrix_error {
219  const char* what() const throw() {
220  return "Invalid row count or index.";
221  }
222  };
223 
227  class slightmatrix_matrix_error: public slightmatrix_error {
228  const char* what() const throw() {
229  return "Invalid matrix (rows incomplete or column count not set).";
230  }
231  };
